EU's centre-right expects to nominate von der Leyen for second term - EPP's CasparyThe European Union's main centre-right alliance will nominate Ursula von der Leyen for a second term as European Commission president at a congress in March if she wants to continue in the post, a senior EU lawmaker told Reuters. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:27:15 GMT 4O6IQ2VAL5I7LK2O3SFXOPQEMA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eus-centre-right-expects-to-nominate-von-der-leyen-second-term-epps-caspary-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia says it finds Ukraine IDs, tattooed body parts at plane crash siteRussia said on Friday it had recovered Ukrainian identity documents and tattooed body parts from the site where a Russian military plane that Moscow says was carrying Ukrainian prisoners of war crashed two days earlier near the Ukrainian border. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:24:45 GMT VZMII2AQHNJMBA2AWJ5NVR3E5 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-finds-ukraine-ids-tattooed-body-parts-plane-crash-site-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Mexico president says to present constitutional reform banning fentanyl consumptionMexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said Friday he will present a constitutional reform to ban consumption of chemical drugs such as fentanyl. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:16:10 GMT NLS63WRRAFL3XOIIKZEB7VNTZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-president-says-present-constitutional-reform-b​​anning-fentanyl-conspiration-2024-01-26/Reuters世界美洲
South Africa hopes Israel will comply with World Court order - ministerSouth Africa hopes Israel will comply with Friday's World Court order that Israel must take steps to prevent acts of genocide as it wages war against Hamas militants in the Gaza Strip, justice minister Ronald Lamola said in an interview. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:13:00 GMT H7VZDC3IZNJ7LFTZUQ6ZU4DVIM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/south-africa-hopes-israel-will-comply-with-world-court-order-minister-2024-01-26/Kopano Gumbi, Siyabonga Sishi世界非洲
Reactions to World Court ruling on Israel's war in GazaThe World Court on Friday ordered Israel to take action to prevent acts of genocide as it wages war against Hamas militants in the Gaza Strip, but it stopped short of calling for an immediate ceasefire as requested by South Africa. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 14:08:10 GMT CFHISXUIA5PM5F4DBG2K742L5Q https://www.reuters.com/world/reactions-world-court-ruling-israel-war-gaza-2024-01-26/Reuters世界
Israel's Netanyahu: Charge of genocide 'outrageous'Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu welcomed a decision by the World Court on Friday not to order a ceasefire in the war in Gaza but rejected a charge of genocide as "outrageous", and said it would continue to defend itself. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:55:09 GMT D33Z4VJAFVOXTKGXS7IPRXOIFQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-israel-comfilled-international-law-will-defend-itself-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东地区
Catalan leader denies spy agency claim he led separatist protest groupCatalonia's regional leader on Friday denied allegations by Spain's spy agency CNI that he had secretly led a radical separatist protest group, which he said CNI had used as a pretext to snoop on him. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:49:39 GMT HYMJXOKW6JNVTKADBA2LYQR6SI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/catalan-leader-denies-spy-agency-claim-he-led-separatist-protest-group-2024-01-26/Joan Faus世界欧洲
U.N. agency probes staff suspected of role in Oct. 7 attacks on IsraelThe United Nations agency for Palestinian refugees (UNRWA) said on Friday it had opened an investigation into several employees suspected of involvement in the Oct. 7 attacks in Israel by Hamas and that it had severed ties with those staff members. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:30:38 GMT 3K3ZTHG3BFJ77HZVEHDDX7OU6M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-palestinian-refugee-agency-investigates-staff-suspected-role-in-israeli-attacks-2024-01-26/Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber世界中东地区
South Africa: court ruling against Israel a victory for rule of lawSouth Africa hailed what it called a "decisive victory" for international rule of law on Friday, after the International Court of Justice ruled in favour of its request to impose emergency measures against Israel over its military operations in Gaza. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:18:46 GMT 6AZFBTNL3FN6VIIRI5KYTJDKV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/south-africa-court-ruling-against-israel-victory-rule-law-2024-01-26/Reuters世界
World Court orders Israel to take measures to prevent acts of genocide in GazaThe World Court on Friday ordered Israel to take all measures within its power to prevent acts of genocide in Gaza. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 12:56:18 GMT MOFP2OZ52FKYVAXEV2UTIQ4LOI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/world-court-orders-israel-take-measures-prevent-acts-of-genocide-in-gaza-2024-01-26/Reuters可持续发展社会与公平
Israel's Ashdod port sees strategic risk from China during Gaza warIsrael's government-run port of Ashdod has complained that a rival Chinese-run terminal at the northern port of Haifa has become a strategic risk during the Gaza war. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 12:45:30 GMT HVAJGYHQSJPLLCO3BYLJUSG6JQ https://www.reuters.com/world/israel-ashdod-port-sees-strategic-risk-china-during-gaza-war-2024-01-26/Ari Rabinovitch, Jonathan Saul世界
